last_episode_to_air.name: Two Hours Later
last_episode_to_air.overview: Police officers recount the search for the van driver and the next attack in Cambrils. The interviewees recall the peace protest held after the attacks.

name: 800 Meters
overview: On Aug. 17, 2017, Spain suffers two terrorist attacks perpetrated by young people integrated into Spanish society. How could something like this happen?

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In 2017, Spain suffered two terrorist attacks perpetrated by young members of its community. How could this happen? This incisive series investigates.

episodes.name: A Group of Friends
episodes.overview: Chilling footage details how the young perpetrators were radicalized to become part of a terrorist movement and the planning of the attacks.

episodes.name: Something Happened on La Rambla
episodes.overview: The emotional testimonies of survivors, victims' relatives and first responders chronicle the events that unfolded on that tragic day on La Rambla.

episodes.name: Two Hours Later
episodes.overview: Police officers recount the search for the van driver and the next attack in Cambrils. The interviewees recall the peace protest held after the attacks.
